name: Email Templates Customizer for WooCommerce + Drag And Drop Template Builder
author: add-ons.org

sections.description:
DEMO: https://pdf.add-ons.org/

Email Templates Customizer for WooCommerce is a powerful plugin that allows you to easily customize the email templates sent to your customers in WooCommerce. With a drag-and-drop interface, it enables you to create and design beautiful emails without needing coding skills. You can add and modify elements like text, images, buttons, products, order details, and more to create emails that align with your brand.

Support for all WooCommerce emails

Customize templates for all types of WooCommerce emails, such as new order, completed order, order notification, account creation, and more.

Drag and Drop Editor

Easily customize emails using various content blocks.

Real-time preview

Instantly see changes as you edit, making design adjustments easier.

Rich customization options

Modify colors, fonts, layouts, and images to fit your brand.

Product and order integration

Insert product details and order information directly into emails.

Conditional Logic

Set display rules for content blocks based on order status, customer type, or order value, allowing for personalized messages to different audiences.

WooCommerce Invoices RTL

RTL Support, Hebrew and Arabic languages,..

Edit default WooCommerce email templates

Modify WooCommerce’s built-in email templates without affecting core code, ensuring compatibility with WooCommerce updates.

Custom event-based emails

Create and send emails triggered by specific events or actions, such as promotional offers, post-purchase thank you emails, or abandoned cart reminders.

Compatibility with WooCommerce extensions

Integrates seamlessly with popular WooCommerce add-ons like WooCommerce Subscriptions, WooCommerce Bookings, and WooCommerce Memberships, enabling automatic emails for actions such as subscription renewals, event reminders, or membership notifications.

Email template export/import

Easily back up, export, and import customized email templates, saving time when moving between sites or reinstalling.

Shortcode support

Use shortcodes to automatically insert dynamic information like customer names, purchased products, total order amounts, and other details into the email content.

Mobile-optimized design

Ensure that your email templates look perfect on all devices, from desktop to mobile, enhancing the user experience across platforms.

With Email Templates Customizer for WooCommerce, you can transform routine transactional emails into powerful marketing tools, enhancing your brand presence, improving customer retention, and driving sales growth effectively.e.

DEMO

<https://pdf.add-ons.org/>
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the woocommerce.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the plugin.zip directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
    Document include in plugin
